con:testSuite.name: Heartbeat Service API Response Format Validation TestSuite

con:testCase.name: C948095-Validate REST endpoint for Heartbeat Service API
C948096-Validate REST response for Heartbeat Service API

con:config.script:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def response = context.expand( '${Step1_GetHeartbeatService_Request#Response}' ) def jsonResponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(response)
log.info("Verifying Heartbeat Response")
assert jsonResponse.containsKey("RegID"), "RegID not found in response" assert jsonResponse.containsKey("DcDateTimeUTC"), "DcDateTimeUTC not found in response" assert jsonResponse.containsKey("AgentDateTimeUTC"), "AgentDateTimeUTC not found in response" assert jsonResponse.containsKey("HeartbeatCounter"), "HeartbeatCounter not found in response"
log.info("Verified Heartbeat Response")

con:testSuite.name: Heartbeat Service API Response Data Validation TestSuite

con:config.script: import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def response = context.expand( '${Step1_GetHeartbeatService_Request#Response}' ).toString() def slurper = new JsonSlurper() def jsonResponse = slurper.parseText response log.info("Verifying RegID field in JSON Heartbeat response") assert (jsonResponse.RegID != null) assert jsonResponse.containsKey("RegID"), "Name property not found in JSON response" log.info("Verified RegID field in JSON Heartbeat response")

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper import java.text.SimpleDateFormat import org.joda.time.format.ISODateTimeFormat import org.joda.time.DateTime def response = context.expand('${Step1_GetHeartbeatService_Request#Response}')
log.info("Verifying DcDateTimeUTC field in JSON response") def jsonResponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(response) def DcDateTimeUTC = jsonResponse.DcDateTimeUTC assert jsonResponse.containsKey('DcDateTimeUTC'), "DcDateTimeUTC field not found" assert DcDateTimeUTC.trim() != "", "DcDateTimeUTC field is empty" def dateTimeFormatStr = "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'" assert(ISODateTimeFormat.dateTimeParser().parseDateTime(DcDateTimeUTC)),"DcDateTimeUTC is not in format: " + dateTimeFormatStr log.info("Verified DcDateTimeUTC field in JSON Heartbeat response")

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper import java.text.SimpleDateFormat import org.joda.time.format.ISODateTimeFormat import org.joda.time.DateTime def response = context.expand('${Step1_GetHeartbeatService_Request#Response}')
log.info("Verifying AgentDateTimeUTC field in JSON response") def jsonResponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(response) def AgentDateTimeUTC = jsonResponse.AgentDateTimeUTC assert jsonResponse.containsKey('AgentDateTimeUTC'), "AgentDateTimeUTC field not found" assert AgentDateTimeUTC.trim() != "", "AgentDateTimeUTC field is empty" def dateTimeFormatStr = "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'" assert(ISODateTimeFormat.dateTimeParser().parseDateTime(AgentDateTimeUTC)),"AgentDateTimeUTC is not in format: " + dateTimeFormatStr log.info("Verified AgentDateTimeUTC field in JSON Heartbeat response")

entry.value: ${#[Mailbox Service API Response Format Validation TestSuite#C948775-Validate REST endpoint for Mailbox Service API#GetMsgId]#id}

con:config.script:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def response = context.expand( '${Step1_GetMailboxService_Request#Response}' ) def jsonResponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(response) log.info(jsonResponse) log.info("Verifying Mailbox Service Response")
assert jsonResponse.containsKey("name"), "name not found in response" assert jsonResponse.containsKey("type"), "type not found in response" assert jsonResponse.containsKey("version"), "version not found in response" assert jsonResponse.containsKey("timestampUTC"), "timestampUTC not found in response" assert jsonResponse.containsKey("path"), "path not found in response" assert jsonResponse.containsKey("message"), "message not found in response"
log.info("Verified Mailbox Service Response")

con:testSuite.name: Version API Response Format Validation TestSuite

con:testCase.name: C1225543-Validate REST endpoint for Version API
C1225544-Validate REST response for Version API

con:config.script:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def response = context.expand( '${Step1_GetAgentServiceVersion_Request#Response}' ) def jsonResponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(response)
log.info("Verifying Version API Response")
assert jsonResponse.containsKey("timeStampUTC"), "timeStampUTC not found in response" assert jsonResponse.containsKey("name"), "name not found in response" assert jsonResponse.containsKey("type"), "type not found in response" assert jsonResponse.containsKey("serviceName"), "serviceName not found in response" assert jsonResponse.containsKey("serviceProvider"), "serviceProvider not found in response" assert jsonResponse.containsKey("serviceVersion"), "serviceVersion not found in response" assert jsonResponse.containsKey("buildNumber"), "buildNumber not found in response"
log.info("Verified Version API Response")

con:testSuite.name: Version API Response Data Validation TestSuite

con:config.script:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper import java.text.SimpleDateFormat import org.joda.time.format.ISODateTimeFormat import org.joda.time.DateTime def response = context.expand('${Step1_GetAgentServiceVersion_Request#Response}')
log.info("Verifying timeStampUTC field in JSON response") def jsonResponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(response) def timeStampUTC = jsonResponse.timeStampUTC assert jsonResponse.containsKey('timeStampUTC'), "timeStampUTC field not found" assert timeStampUTC.trim() != "", "timeStampUTC field is empty" def dateTimeFormatStr = "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'" assert(ISODateTimeFormat.dateTimeParser().parseDateTime(timeStampUTC)),"timeStampUTC is not in format: " + dateTimeFormatStr log.info("Verified timeStampUTC field in JSON Heartbeat response")

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def response = context.expand( '${Step1_GetAgentServiceVersion_Request#Response}' ).toString() def slurper = new JsonSlurper() def jsonResponse = slurper.parseText response def name = context.expand( '${#TestSuite#name}' ) log.info("Verifying name field in JSON response") assert (jsonResponse.name != null) assert (jsonResponse.name != "") assert jsonResponse.containsKey("name"), "Name property not found in JSON response" assert(jsonResponse.name == name),"Name property is not same as AgentServiceSolution" log.info("Verified name field in JSON response")

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def response = context.expand( '${Step1_GetAgentServiceVersion_Request#Response}' ).toString() def slurper = new JsonSlurper() def jsonResponse = slurper.parseText response def type = context.expand( '${#TestSuite#type}' ) log.info("Verifying type field in JSON response") assert (jsonResponse.type != null) assert (jsonResponse.type != "") assert jsonResponse.containsKey("type"), "type property not found in JSON response" assert(jsonResponse.type == type),"type property is not same as Version" log.info("Verified type field in JSON response")

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def response = context.expand( '${Step1_GetAgentServiceVersion_Request#Response}' ).toString() def slurper = new JsonSlurper() def jsonResponse = slurper.parseText response def serviceName = context.expand( '${#TestSuite#serviceName}' ) log.info("Verifying serviceName field in JSON response") assert (jsonResponse.serviceName != null) assert (jsonResponse.serviceName != "") assert jsonResponse.containsKey("serviceName"), "serviceName property not found in JSON response" assert(jsonResponse.serviceName == serviceName),"serviceName property is not same as Agent Micro-Service" log.info("Verified serviceName field in JSON response")

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def response = context.expand( '${Step1_GetAgentServiceVersion_Request#Response}' ).toString() def slurper = new JsonSlurper() def jsonResponse = slurper.parseText response def serviceProvider = context.expand( '${#TestSuite#serviceProvider}' ) log.info("Verifying serviceProvider field in JSON response") assert (jsonResponse.serviceProvider != null) assert (jsonResponse.serviceProvider != "") assert jsonResponse.containsKey("serviceProvider"), "serviceProvider property not found in JSON response" assert(jsonResponse.serviceProvider == serviceProvider),"serviceProvider property is not same as Agent Micro-Service" log.info("Verified serviceProvider field in JSON response")

C1227423-Validate REST response for HealthCheck API

con:config.script:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def response = context.expand( '${Step1_GetAgentServiceHealthCheck_Request#Response}' ) def jsonResponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(response)
log.info("Verifying HealthCheck API Response")
assert jsonResponse.containsKey("timeStampUTC"), "timeStampUTC not found in response" assert jsonResponse.containsKey("name"), "name not found in response" assert jsonResponse.containsKey("type"), "type not found in response" assert jsonResponse.containsKey("serviceName"), "serviceName not found in response" assert jsonResponse.containsKey("serviceProvider"), "serviceProvider not found in response" assert jsonResponse.containsKey("serviceVersion"), "serviceVersion not found in response" assert jsonResponse.containsKey("buildNumber"), "buildNumber not found in response" assert jsonResponse.containsKey("networkInterfaces"), "networkInterfaces not found in response" assert jsonResponse.containsKey("status"), "status not found in response" assert jsonResponse.containsKey("startTime"), "StartTime not found in response" assert jsonResponse.containsKey("cpuPercentage"), "cpuPercentage not found in response" assert jsonResponse.containsKey("numOfOSThreads"), "numOfOSThreads not found in response" assert jsonResponse.containsKey("memoryPercentage"), "MemoryPercentage not found in response"
log.info("Verified HealthCheck API Response")
